dict.acceptation: 比（用于比较级）；宁愿……而不愿；除……以外；一……就；

sent.orig: Joe was no richer than his friend.
sent.trans: 乔并不比他的朋友富。[乔和他的朋友一样穷。]（比较：Joe was not richer than his friend。乔比不上他的朋友富。）

sent.orig: It's better to go back and make a net than to stand by the pond and long for fish.; Better return home and make a net than long for fish by the waterside.; It's better to go back and make a net than to covet the fish by merely staring into the water -- one should have a down-to-earth style of work to attain one's goal.; One should take practical steps to achieve one's aims.
sent.trans: 临渊羡鱼，莫如退而结网。

sent.orig: He is younger than I by much.; He is much younger than I.
If the illegal gains are very large the counterfeiter shall be sentenced to fixed-term imprisonment of not less than three years and not more than seven years and be fined.
sent.trans: 对于违法所得数额巨大的，处3年以上7年以下有期徒刑，并处罚金。

sent.orig: They raised their output by more than half in less than three years.
sent.trans: 不到三年，他们把产量提高了一半还多。
